Olympics|Athens 2004]] {{•}} [[2006 Winter Olympics|Turin 2006]] {{•}} ''[[2008 Summer Olympics|Beijing 2008]]'' {{•}} ''[[2010 Winter Olympics|Vancouver 2010]]'' }} === (1906) === The [[1906 Summer Olympics]] or 1906 [[Intercalated Games]] were discounted ''ex post facto'' by the [[International Olympic Committee|IOC]]. All medals awarded during these games have not since been counted officially on total medal counts. === 1916 === These games were cancelled due to the World Wars. The [[1916 Summer Olympics]] were cancelled due to the onset of WWI; both the Summer and Winter Olympics of [[1940 Summer Olympics|1940]] and [[1944 Summer Olympics|1944]] were cancelled due to WWII.
